freelancing_services.description: Customizing CRM platforms and implementing integrations to enhance business processes.
Developing and maintaining websites and web applications tailored to client needs.
Creating seamless connections between different software systems for improved data flow.
Assisting in designing and implementing user interfaces with a focus on usability.
Setting up and optimizing development workflows and automated deployment pipelines.
Providing guidance and support in Agile project management and team workflows.
Designing and automating workflows to streamline business operations.
Designing, managing, and optimizing databases for robust and efficient data handling.
Developing systems for managing documents, including automation and integrations.
Creating scripts and bots to automate repetitive tasks and enhance productivity.
Producing clear and detailed technical documentation for systems and processes.
Deploying and managing applications on AWS using services like EC2, Lambda, and S3.
Setting up scalable and secure cloud infrastructure using AWS services.
Assisting businesses in migrating their applications and data to AWS.
Building CI/CD pipelines and automating deployments using AWS tools like CodePipeline and CloudFormation.
Configuring AWS security groups, IAM roles, and encryption for secure cloud environments.
Analyzing and optimizing AWS usage to reduce costs while maintaining performance.
